REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1401 reute b f BC-TREASURY'S-BAKER-HOPE 04-01 0080

TEXT.TITLE: TREASURY'S BAKER HOPES PRIME RATE RISE TEMPORARY
TEXT.BODY: Treasury Secretary James Baker said he hopes yesterday's small increase in two major money center banks' prime rate was a temporary phenomenon. "I hope it was a temporary blip upward," he told a House Appropriations subcommittee. He said the decline in interest rates since President Reagan took office remains "one of the significant accomplishments, in the economic area, of this administration." Reuter
